messages.subject: RE Hooked on Phonics
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know where but I would try this. Call the company or search through some of the academic sales places online to see if they have academic pricing for
messages.messageBody:
I don't know where but I would try this. Call the company or search through
some of the academic sales places online to see if they have "academic
pricing" for this program. I just found out that Adope Photoshop 7 which
would cost me about $650 locally can be had for about $280 through academic
pricing. Each product has different rules. SOmetimes you need to be a school
but I started seeing that many of these (expensive ) programs are also sold
to homeschoolers for that price!!!
Also I saw some on ebay.

Here are a few stores online -these were sites recommended by a company that
has plugins for Adobe Photoshop. I don't think they have what you need but
this is good info for all interested in getting what they are buying at a
lower cost.
http://www.academicsuperstore.com

http://www.a-plus-computing.com/

http://www.creationengine.com/html/pr_search.html


http://www.gotrc.com/

This site has a classroom program of Hooked on Phonics but looks more
expensive as there is more than one copy. You might call them and ask if
they have a single copy at academic prcing or the company itself.

http://www.hop.com/teachers/included.jhtml

Francine


>
>
> Message: 25
> Date: Sat, 10 Aug 2002 05:30:50 +0000
> From: "tonya wright" <chatadict2t@...>
> Subject: Hooked on phonics?
>
> We are contemplating buying Hooked on Phonics for Brittany. I looked up
the
> info. on the official web site & it is $299.99 + 27.50 shipping &
handling.
> YIKES! Do you know of any other places we could buy it? If there was a
> store around that sold it at least we could save the shipping & handling.
> Also, do you know anyone who has used it?
>
> Tonya
> Brittany & Melody's Mommy
> 4/22/99 12/01/01
